name: Terminalation
description: Based on Rist's mDrifus - Firefox Aero Glass Project.
additional_info: NOTICE: Requires Windows Vista or 7 to look as described in the screenshot. The text may be inconvenient to read using non-dark visual styles since all text is in white. Works best with Noche Visual Style by kiko11. But if you're so inclined to use a white visual style, have a look at mini.fox Redux instead. Special Thanks to makondo and foxxyn8.
